Class BuyDevCardMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.messages.clientMessages.BuyDevCardMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientMessage, GameControllerHandleable, TurnControllerHandleable, java.io.Serializable
public class BuyDevCardMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnControllerHandleable
This class contains information regarding a BuyDevCard action.
